channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A new Utah law is Republicans' latest effort to limit mail ballot return
item.description: Utah's new law is part of a larger effort by Republicans to limit the window in which mail ballots can be counted during an election.

item.title: Trump officials downplay the Signal leak. Some military members see a double standard
item.description: The news of the leak of life-and-death operational details to a reporter lands differently with veterans and active-duty troops, who can be prosecuted...

item.title: Déjà vu all over again? Dodgers are favorites as 2025 MLB season begins
item.description: Major League Baseball's 2025 season gets fully underway Thursday. The scary news for the league: the defending champion Los Angeles Dodgers, favorites...

item.title: Trump's new tariffs could raise car prices. And, Dems demand answers after Signal leak
item.description: Trump announced he'll impose 25% tariffs on imported cars starting next week. The decision received mixed reactions. And, Democrats are demanding answ...

item.title: March Madness and babies: Are the sounds of the game too big for little ears?
item.description: What's the right age to take kids to a loud sporting event? A Johns Hopkins noise expert on protecting babies' ears and when game day noise might be t...

item.title: French-Algerian writer jailed over Morocco comments
item.description: Boualem Sansal, 80, told a far-right news outlet that colonial France gave too much land to Algeria.

item.title: Trump announces 25% tariffs on car imports to US
item.description: The US President says the tariffs on cars will come into effect on 2 April and car parts a month later.

item.title: 3/26: The Daily Report
item.description: Lindsey Reiser reports on newly released texts surrounding military plans in a leaked government group chat, the Supreme Court's ruling on ghost guns,...

item.title: Michigan resident dies after getting rabies from transplanted organ
item.description: A Michigan resident died of rabies after an organ transplant in Ohio, health officials say.

item.title: Belize officials say 3 American women died of carbon monoxide poisoning
item.description: The three women from Massachusetts who were on vacation in Belize died of carbon monoxide poisoning, officials confirmed Wednesday.

item.title: VP's arrest ends South Sudan peace deal, his party says
item.description: Riek Machar and his wife are detained after a convoy of 20 armed vehicles entered his home, his party says.

item.title: States move to ban or restrict use of synthetic dyes used in candies and cereal
3/26: CBS Evening News
item.description: Atlantic publishes more texts from Trump officials; These presidents hated their officials portraits

item.title: Why have the wildfires in S Korea been so devastating?
item.description: Strong wind, dry land and pine trees are a dangerous combination for wildfires, experts say.

item.title: 2/27: CBS Morning News
item.description: Actor Gene Hackman, wife found dead in New Mexico home; Nationwide "economic blackout" planned for Friday.

item.title: Zelensky hopes US will 'stand strong' in face of Russian demands
item.description: The Ukrainian president was answering questions from a panel of European journalists in Paris.

item.title: Pilot rescued with 2 girls from icy Alaska lake was not authorized to have passengers, official says
